content: knit the 12 st total st now on all needles - 40 row 17 25 repeat in this fashion decreasing 2 st each round until st on needles a and b are decr to 5 st each and total st in round is decr to 22 st row 26 27 knit row 28 35 k1 p1 repeat row 36 bind off loosely in pattern using needle 2 sizes larger graft sole--done original pattern by laurel lancaster please do not copy if used to make for sale please reference the shop http //madcowdog etsy com enjoy madcowdog@gmail com
